title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 177.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 177.1 - Application

State Regulations

In accordance with Labor Law, section 167, this Part shall
apply to health care employers, who shall be prohibited from assigning
mandatory overtime to nurses except in certain circumstances as described in
this regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
177.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
